definitions: (in mining) the excavation of a series of steps or layers in the ground or rock

examples.text: underground stoping and work on the smelters had been very costly

shortDefinitions: excavation of series of steps in ground

definitions: the process by which country rock is broken up and removed by the upward movement of magma

examples.text: the magma chamber may have been largely opened by overhead stoping

shortDefinitions: process by which country rock is removed by upward movement of magma
